text: Innum, nam luhkmanukku niccayamaka nanattaik kotuttom. "Allahvukku nir nanri celuttum; enenral evan nanri celuttukirano avan tana(tu nanmai)kkave nanri celuttukiran; innum evan nirakarikkirano (avan tannaiye nattappatuttik kolkiran) - niccayamaka allah (evaritattaruntum) tevaiyillatavan; pukalappatupavan
